Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorymanagementsystem.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
creates the inventory class for the main inventory

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> temp
      observable list of type part. temporary list that stores parts before adding them to the associated part list

    • searchProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> searchProducts(String search)
      searches the product list using a string if the string is empty, return the entire list otherwise, search the list for any matching strings next, check if the string is actually an integer if it is, search the list again using the integer and comparing it against the product ids return all matching results
      Parameters:
      search - string to search
      Returns:
      matching products

    • searchParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> searchParts(String search)
      searches the part list using a string if the string is empty, return the entire list otherwise, search the list for any matching strings next, check if the string is actually an integer if it is, search the list again using the integer and comparing it against the part ids return all matching results
      Parameters:
      search - string to search
      Returns:
      matching parts
